description:
Go to Organization >> Teller/Cashier Management .. New Teller, Set End date .. submit
Edit Teller, empty end date field, submit,, nothing happen
it shouldn't act as a mandatory, since when creating teller it is not mandatory

### How to Submit

Submit a pull request linking to the issue and include the link to the pull request in your submission through the GCI Portal.
name: Mifos - Bug Fix: End Date shouldn't act as a mandatory field when editing teller
